name: Flames (Jay/Shiloh)
description:
This is my first ever game: And I am a freshman in highschool.

Update One 3/28/21: Three more character interactions, 1 more clue (Not Much) 

This game Includes:

  • 3 Endings
  • 9 Characters
  • And a pretty fancinating story if I do say so myself!

Though, this is a short game made in 4 days.

Inspired by: Cradles (Sub Urban) and The Promised Neverland.
